topic.title: Automatic Logout
topic.p: You can set the length of time that you want your system to remain logged on after it becomes idle.

ol.title: To set your automatic-logout time duration:

li.p: In the My Preferences menu group, click Auto-Logout (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Next to Logout, select how long you want your system to remain logged on after it becomes idle (1, 2, 8, or 24 hours).

Click Save. A message appears informing you that your changes have been saved.
Note: When the system automatically ends your session and you attempt to do anything in your Control Panel, the Login screen appears. Type your user ID and password; then click Login to start a new session.
